dialogue.htmlContent: Having enslaved all of the imps, there's nothing left for you to do except continue on your way through the tunnels...

[npc.speech(What are you doing?!)] [npc.name] screeches in alarm, [npc.speech(You can't enslave us! Stop it!)]

Grinning at the remaining imps before you, you wonder whether you should continue with your task of enslaving them, or leave them be...

[npc.speech(Stop it!)] [npc.name] scream, [npc.speech(Don't do it! I don't want to be a slave!)]

Grinning at this last defeated imp, you wonder whether you should enslave [npc.herHim] as well, or leave [npc.herHim] be...

Your last opponent collapses to the ground at your feet, and you and [com.name] breathe a sigh of relief as you look down at the gang of defeated imps before you. Despite their superior numbers, they proved to be no match your combined might, and now that you've proven yourself in battle, you wonder what you should do about these trouble-makers.

Considering how many imps there are infesting these tunnels, you know that the chances of encountering these particular foes again are slim-to-none, so if you wanted to do anything with them, now's the time. If nothing else, perhaps you could appropriate the transformation potions that these imps were planning to use on you and your companion?

#IF(game.getNonCompanionCharactersPresent().size()==1)

You aren't interested in doing anything more to this last defeated [npc.race], and so, standing to one side, you command, [pc.speech(Go on, get out of here, and don't come back!)]

Groaning as [npc.she] pushes [npc.herself] to [npc.her] feet, the [npc.race] does as you say, and staggers off deeper into the tunnels of Submission. After watching [npc.herHim] leave, you and [com.name] prepare to continue on your way...

[npc.speech(No! I ain't finished yet!)] [npc.name] [npc.moansVerb] in frustration as [npc.she] realises that you've finished with [npc.herHim].

Having had your fun, you ignore the imps' pathetic whining and set about getting your things in order. After just a moment, you're ready to continue on your way, but as you take one last glance at the still-panting imps, you wonder if you should take another look at their inventories. Then again, that might be more trouble than it's worth, and it might be best to simply leave them be and head off into the tunnels with [com.name] once again...
